title: Steel Armour City - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Mecha   Psychological   Romance   Slice of Life   Supernatural
author: 随疯而来
description: The war between the Mechanic City and humans has been going on for a hundred years. After being cleared by the Mechanic Troops, the soldier Li Xinyan woke up in the dungeon. He found that his body had been transformed. He was no longer a human being, but a mechanical life form!>
